get.description: read all the databases using hostname,username and password

post.description: Create a new database with the specified name and owner

delete.description: Delete a database with the specified ID
Delete a collection with the specified ID

get.description: Lists all the collections in the database

post.description: Create a new collection with the specified name and description

get.description: Get all clusters along with their advanced configuration by project ID

patch.description: Update the cluster with the provided MongoDbVersion and MongoDBMajorVersion
patch.summary: UpdateCluster handles the Put requests to create the provided MongoDbVersion and MongoDBMajorVersion

post.description: create the cluster with the provided TshirtSize
post.summary: CreateCluster handles the POST requests to create the cluster with the provided TshirtSize

delete.description: Delete a cluster by project ID and cluster name

get.description: Returns the restore job for the specified cluster.

parameters.description: The name of the cluster to restore.
parameters.name: ClusterName

parameters.description: The ID of the project that contains the cluster to restore.
parameters.name: ProjectId

parameters.description: The JobID of the cluster to restore.
parameters.name: JobId

post.description: Creates a restore job for the specified cluster.

parameters.description: The name of the cluster to restore.
parameters.name: ClusterName

parameters.description: The ID of the project that contains the cluster to restore.
parameters.name: ProjectId

parameters.description: The ID of the snapshot to restore.
parameters.name: SnapshotId

parameters.description: The timestamp of the oplog to restore.
parameters.name: OpLogTs

parameters.description: The increment of the oplog to restore.
parameters.name: OpLogInc

parameters.description: The point-in-time to restore, specified as a Unix timestamp in seconds.
parameters.name: PointInTimeUtcSeconds

parameters.description: The name of the target cluster.
parameters.name: TargetClusterName

parameters.description: The ID of the project that contains the target cluster.
parameters.name: TargetProjectId

parameters.description: The delivery type of the restore job.
parameters.name: DeliveryType

get.description: Get all cloud backup snapshots of a cluster by project ID and cluster name
get.summary: Get all cloud backup snapshots of a cluster

post.description: Create a cloud backup snapshot of a cluster by project ID and cluster name
post.summary: Create a cloud backup snapshot of a cluster

get.description: Get the state of a cluster by project ID and cluster name
get.summary: Get the state of a cluster

get.description: Get the state of a cluster backup schedule by project ID and cluster name
get.summary: Get the state of a cluster backup schedule

patch.summary: UpdateClusterBackupPolicy handles the PUT requests to update the cluster backup policy

post.description: Create a new database user with the specified name and email

delete.description: Delete a database user with the specified ID

get.description: Get a database user with the specified ID
